txt.en: Attention cooks,\n\nThere is much disease in these grim times, spread by the coming of the evil forces which have come here. We need assistance to ensure the continued health of our people. If you can cook hearty onion soup, please deliver some to Léoflac at our encampment at Ost Guruth.

'This smells delicious. I wish to thank you for preparing this. If you have more, please deliver it to us. Disease is sure to begin spreading soon now that we must remain in this close proximity.\n\n'Thank you for doing this.'
'Is there an undertaking that you are currently working on for the Eglain? Perhaps you should complete the order before returning to me....'
Living in a section of land teeming with disease, the Eglain have put out a general call for cooks to make hearty onion soup so they may hearten themselves against the growing threat of disease.
Collected servings of hearty onion soup ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the hearty onion soup to Léoflac

Craft two servings of hearty onion soup and deliver them to Léoflac at the Eglan-encampment at Ost Guruth.\n\nThe Eglain, in an effort to stave off the spread of disease, have asked for cooks to make them hearty onion soup.
Collect servings of hearty onion soup ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
